enableRubberTreeGeneration.comment: When enabled rubber trees will generate in the world

enableOreGeneration.comment: When enabled ores will generate in the world

enableOverworldLoot.comment: When true TechReborn will add ingots, machine frames and circuits to OverWorld loot chests.

enableEndLoot.comment: When true TechReborn will add ingots, machine frames and circuits to The End loot chests.

enableNetherLoot.comment: When true TechReborn will add ingots, machine frames and circuits to Nether loot chests.
